text: aur usase badhakar atyaachaaree aur kaun hoga jisane allaah kee masjidon ko usake naam ke smaran se vanchit rakha aur unhen ujaadane par utaaroo raha? aise logon ko to bas darate hue hee usamen pravesh karana chaahie tha. unake lie sansaar mein rusavaee (apamaan) hai aur unake lie aakhirat mein badee yaatana niyat hai
